# Sampling overview 
 <!-- TODO: Image or plate of species --> 
Sampling is currently structured in Phases as LepEU scales up capacity.
If you wish to suggest species, please contact us.

## **Phase 1**: n=13 species
This set is from 2024, including 5 of the European Biodiversity Grassland Indicator species. Goal for 2025 is to complete this sampling across collection hubs. 

- *Aglais io*
- *Aglais urticae*
- *Anthocharis cardamines*
- *Callophrys rubi*
- *Coenonympha pamphilus*
- *Gonepteryx rhamni*
- *Lasiommata megera*
- *Maniola jurtina*
- *Melitaea cinxia*
- *Pararge aegeria*
- *Pieris napi*
- *Pieris rapae*
- *Polyommatus icarus*

## **Phase 2**: n=12 species
Expands species to now include all of the [European Biodiversity Grassland Indicator species](https://butterfly-monitoring.net/sites/default/files/Pdf/Indicators/VS2022.039%20European_Grassland_Butterfly_Indicator_1990-2020_v3.pdf)

- *Cupido minimus*
- *Cyaniris semiargus*
- *Erynnis tages*
- *Euphydryas aurinia*
- *Lycaena phlaeas*
- *Ochlodes sylvanus*
- *Phengaris arion*
- *Phengaris nausithous*
- *Polyommatus bellargus*
- *Polyommatus coridon*
- *Spialia sertorius*
- *Thymelicus acteon*

## **Phase 3**: 
We are actively working to extend our sampling and regional sampling hubs to represent the full range of Lepidopteran biodiversity across all of Europe, especially including a range of moth species.

If you wish to suggest species for continental scale population sampling, please contact us.
